title: NUST officially declared as a Special Technology Zone
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 09 (APP):Celebrating a new era of innovation and technology, National University of Science and Technology (NUST) has been officially declared as a Special Technology Zone by the government.
According to the Zone Notification, “In exercise of power conferred under Section 4(2)(b) of the Special Technology Zones Authority Act, 2021, the authority hereby notifies the following location (NUST) as a Special Technology Zone”.
NUST has come a long way as a premier science and technology university of Pakistan, since its inception in March 1991.
It has earned the infallible reputation of being a next-generation university with a strong focus on multidisciplinary higher education, research and innovation.
